data.name: Maximize Employes Work
data.description:
a organization have `n` employess numbered from 1 to `n`, we want to divide it two 2 team, each team should not empty, but their number of employes can be unequal. each employes must belong to a team.

for a group, its known they will work more efficient if all member in a group are on the same team.
there are `m` groups, the `ith` of which consist `ki` employees and has a efficiency level `fi`
each group all of whose members are on the same team,add `fi` to the total efficiency level.

Find the maximum possible total efficient level.

Explanation

There m group, they are `G1 = {1,2}, G2 = {1,3}, G3 = {2,3,4}` and their efficiency level = `f1 = 4, f2 = 5, f3 = 10`. There many possible way to select two team. Here some of the possible

`{1,2} {3,4}` One team contain `G1` and the other team contain no group.total efficiency = `f1=4`
`{1,2,3} {4}` One team contain `G1 and G2` and the other team contains no group. so its total efficiency is `f1 + f2 = 9`
`{2,3} {1,4}` Both team contain no group.
`{1} {2,3,4}` One team contain `G3` group, and the other team contain no group. total efficiency is `f3 = 10`

What if two group with same employees, but different efficiency?
for a example
`n = 4` `m = 3`
`G1 = [1,2,3] F = 5`
`G2 = [1,2,3] F = 10`
`G3 = [4] F = 4`
this means that (effectively) you have 2 groups:
`G1 = [1 2 3], F=15`
`G2 = [4] F=4`
